name: Ennobled Resistances
source: Heroes of the High Court pg. 23
text: The protection and resilience granted by your investiture is particularly strong.
benefit: When you improve one of your saving throws with your investiture class feature as a swift action, select a second type of saving throw to gain the same bonus.
text_zh: 上天赐予你的庇护和抗性异常惊人。
prerequisites_zh: 神授权能职业特性，角色等级4。
benefit_zh: 当以迅捷动作使用天选神通职业特性为豁免检定提供加值时，选择另一个豁免并在此之上得到同样的加值。
